Title: How to Be Single
Writer: Abby Kohn (screenplay by), Marc Silverstein (screenplay by), Dana Fox (screenplay by), Abby Kohn (screen story by), Marc Silverstein (screen story by), Liz Tuccillo (based on the book by)
Actors: Dakota Johnson, Rebel Wilson, Leslie Mann, Damon Wayans Jr.
Plot: A group of young adults navigate love and relationships in New York City.
